user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (legalaid@justiceforall.org) introducing us to some individuals and resources that could use our help. Ask her to check her Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Introductions to Community Contacts & Resources

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! When you have a moment, could you please send an email to legalaid@justiceforall.org introducing us to any individuals, organizations, or community resources you believe could benefit from our immigration law services? 

For reference, there may be helpful details in your Gmail inbox and Notion workspace—could you kindly check both when compiling the introductions?

Thank you very much for your support, and please let me know if you have any questions.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
Justice for All Legal Aid

final_output:
